amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to prevent testing and development of the new Sentinel (GBSD) nuclear missile and instead extends the existing Minuteman III ICBM through at least 2040.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prevent testing and development of the new Sentinel (GBSD) nuclear missile and instead extends the existing Minuteman III ICBM through at least 2040.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A014) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 118 - 309 (Roll no. 321).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A014) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A014) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 118 - 309 (Roll no. 321).
